posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tom Hines
I am looking for any Paul Hines cards (n172, Buchner, Tobin, etc.). Any condition. I will pay cash or will possibly trade with other n172 commons (I have about 40 to work with). Thank you.

Tom

Posted By: Thomas Hines
I am still on the hunt for any Paul Hines cards! I do not have the OJ trade bait anymore but still have quite a bunch of T cards and some candy issues. Of course I still have cash available. While I do have quite a few Paul Hines cards already I am interested in others and possible upgrades. I am also looking for an N172 Jack Farrell tagging (yes you guessed it, Paul Hines is the one being tagged).
I am also interested in Hunkey Hines N172's so please let me know what you have. 

Thank you,

Tom
